calculated_fields.MTM (in CAD) T:
if [Parameters].[Use Custom Date] then 
    (if [Max Date]= [RpDate] then [MTM (in CAD)] else 0 END)
else if [RpDate]= [Parameters].[End Date] then [MTM (in CAD)] else 0 END END
calculated_fields.Max Date:
case datepart('weekday',today())
    when 1 then today()-2
    when 2 then today()-3
    else today()-1
    END
